title: Velocity acceleration of projectile at max height

content.question: The velocity of a projectile at launch has a horizontal component vh and a vertical component vv. Air resistance is negligible. When the projectile is at the highest point of its trajectory, which of the following show the vertical and horizontal components of its velocity and the vertical component of its acceleration?

choices.label: Vertical Velocity Horizontal Velocity Vertical Acceleration vv vh 0
Vertical Velocity Horizontal Velocity Vertical Acceleration vv 0 0
Vertical Velocity Horizontal Velocity Vertical Acceleration 0 vh 0
Vertical Velocity Horizontal Velocity Vertical Acceleration 0 0 ùóÄ
Vertical Velocity Horizontal Velocity Vertical Acceleration 0 vh ùóÄ

content.answer: Vertical Velocity Horizontal Velocity Vertical Acceleration 0 vh ùóÄ

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
